translations: n.海扇贝；贝壳；扇贝形物体
vt.使成扇贝形；把……切成薄片；烘烤；捕捞扇贝（等于 scollop）

phrs.translation: 海扇贝, 海贝, 海扇, 扇贝

sentences.sentence: Escallop Shell - One who has made long journeys or voyages to far countries, who had borne considerable naval command or who had gained great victories.
sentences.translation: 扇贝壳-曾有过远渡异国他乡经历的人，或是有杰出的海军指挥能力，或是功绩卓越的人。
